# GaugeStyleConfiguration.Label

**Structure**

A type-erased label of a gauge, describing its purpose.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency struct Label
```

## Describing the purpose of the gauge

- **label**: A view that describes the purpose of the gauge.

## Conforms To

- View
